title: Episode 272 w/ Beanie Sigel
itunes:title: Episode 272 w/ Beanie Sigel
description:
N.O.R.E. & DJ EFN are the Drink Champs. In this episode, we chop it up with the legendary Beanie Sigel!

Coming from South Philly, Beans shares stories of his come up and how he signed to the iconic Roc-A-Fella Records!

Beanie shares stories of JAY Z, The Hard Knock Life Tour, State Property and much much more!

Make some noise for the great Beanie Sigel!!!Â ğŸ†ğŸ†ğŸ†
